description: Marketing tools to reach your customers
Automated marketing campaigns - setup once, run whenever and as much as you like

pricing_hint: Free to install. Additional charges may apply.
title: Calendify
description_raw:
Create holiday marketing campaigns. Get the most out of seasonal sales using our marketing tools.

Calendify makes holiday marketing easy for you! With help of our specialized marketing tools: email campaigns, announcement bars, and scheduled sales merchants can effectively reach their audience on their favorite occasions. Stop planning manually your every holiday initiative, just browse through our curated calendar of marketing opportunities, pick ones that you are interested in, select the types of promotions that you want to activate and that's it, the rest is on us.
